Divshot: An Awesome Way to Design and Build Bootstrap Pages | Design Shack

19 Dec 2012

http://designshack.net/articles/css/divshot-an-awesome-way-to-design-and-build-bootstrap-pages/
Another drag and drop prototyping system for Bootstrap

With Divshot, you can quickly and easily build clean, responsive web page layouts using a combination of visual tools and hand coding. It’s a really slick tool and I think you’re going to enjoy using it.
